exec: // Check if the applications array exists
// Search for the application with name "New Application"
let application = response.applications.find(t => t.name === "API Test Application");
// If the application is found, set the ID as a collection variable
console.log("Found application ID:", application.id);  // Log the ID for verification
console.log("application with name 'API Test Application' not found");
console.log("Response does not contain a valid 'applications' array");
